entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
